long_description: Featuring durability that's on par with high-end SUPs, the Aquaglide Impulse 12 ft. stand up paddleboard offers stiff, stable and responsive performance. Optimized for touring, you'll enjoy the 12 ft. Impulse during longer trips on flatwater where glide, tracking and speed are important factors. Streamlined nose shape cuts through light chop. 300 lb. weight capacity is suited to larger riders, and 32 in. width offers stability that novices will find helpful during their first outings. Fiberglass composite over a foam core offers high stiffness and side-to-side response. 5mm wood stringers enhance performance. Soft deck pad offers comfortable traction. EVA tail, rail and nose guards enhance durability. 9.25 in. single fin enhances tracking. The Aquaglide Impulse 12 ft. paddleboard weighs 54 lbs. and includes a heavy-duty molded handle for transport.
short_description: Featuring durability that's on par with high-end SUPs, the Aquaglide Impulse 12 ft. stand up paddleboard offers stiff, stable and responsive performance.
